name: Walueke In The Darkness
description:
WARNING: IF YOU ARE EPILEPTIC PLEASE BE CAREFUL

Controls:

SHIFT - RUN

WASD/ARROW - MOVE

E - INTERACT

F - OPEN TABLET

G - THROW GLOWSTICK

You are an 11-year-old girl named Elizabeth, who lives only with your parents. One day your parents go on a 4-day trip and leave a babysitter looking after you. At dusk you hear a noise coming from the entrance to your home. When you get there you find your nanny fallen, dead and behind her a gigantic humanoid figure, ready to make you his next victim. Will you be able to survive the 4 days until your parents arrive?

ADVICE: The game isn't finished, so I'll keep update soon...
